# LokaFlow™ — Synthetic PII test samples
# IMPORTANT: All data below is SYNTHETIC. No real personal information.
# Used only for PIIScanner unit tests.

# Emails (synthetic)
test.user@example.com
alice+work@synthetic-company.nl
noreply@test.invalid

# Dutch IBANs (synthetic — valid format, not real accounts)
NL91ABNA0417164300
NL02ABNA0123456789

# BSNs (synthetic — valid Elfproef, not real BSNs)
123456782

# Phone numbers (synthetic)
06-12345678
+31612345678
+1-555-000-1234

# Credit card numbers (synthetic — valid Luhn, not real cards)
4111 1111 1111 1111

# IP addresses (private range — not real external IPs)
192.168.1.100
10.0.0.1

# Clean texts (should NOT trigger PII detection)
How do I implement a binary search tree?
const sum = (a: number, b: number): number => a + b;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = true;
function calculateTotal(items) { return items.reduce((a, b) => a + b.price, 0); }
